translation: Even if thou art the most sinful of all sinners, yet thou shalt surely cross over all sins by the raft of knowledge.
commentary: 4.36 even even? Chet if? Asi (thou) art? from sins than sinners? to all (than) all? papakrittamah most sinful? Everything all? by the raft of knowledge? Eve alone? Vrijinam sin? You will cross (thou) shalt cross.Commentary You can cross the ocean of sin with the boat of the knowledge of the Self. (Cf.IX.30)
